1:
--------------------
<Text: Man Will Conquer Space Soon!:  was the title of a famous series of 1950s magazine articles in "Collier's" detailing Wernher von Braun's plans for manned spaceflight.>
Triplets:<Man Will Conquer Space Soon!
2:
--------------------
<Text: Man Will Conquer Space Soon!:  Edited by Cornelius Ryan, the individual articles were authored by such space notables of the time as Willy Ley, Fred Lawrence Whipple, Dr. Joseph Kaplan, Dr. Heinz Haber, and von Braun.>

Triplets:<Man Will Conquer Space Soon!
3:
--------------------
<Text: Man Will Conquer Space Soon!:  The articles were illustrated with paintings and drawings by Chesley Bonestell, Fred Freeman, and Rolf Klep, some of the finest magazine illustrators of the time.>
Triplets:<Man Will Conquer Space Soon!
